list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: set original ads an d loader in app. and also set banner ad on Tv_list activity.

task.summary: update wifi and ir remote app on github first time.
Commit banner add code from IR remote classes.
remove banner ads and add interstitial ads in all remotes. change layout orientation left to right.
replace lgRemote.java with LgWifiRemoteActivity.java to resolve issues.
Change Navigation design. And also remove issue from RemoteAdapter.java of Lg remote. Change splash screen with gif.
Resolve languages issue. give layout direction left to right.
last changes for interstitial ads. make four interstitial ads to remove limit from account.
set original ads an d loader in app. and also set banner ad on Tv_list activity.
